name: Hide & Seek!
description:
A short quiz game in retro style, created for the 10-minutes game challenge of RPG BIZ.

Features:

  • 2 Quiz categories to choose from
  • Randomly generated math operations
  • Multiple possible endings
  • Happy colors
  • Happy smileys
  • Happy sprites
  • Friends

Special thanks to 

  • Rabosion for Graphics
  • YouFulca for BGMs

Please check credits.rtf inside the game folder for a detailed credit list.
